law.catch_line: It is the intent of the General Assembly that the Department shall:...
law.text:
It is the intent of the General Assembly that the Department shall:
Consider sustainable communities as it considers annual revisions under the Consolidated Transportation Program in § 2-103.1(b) through (f) of this title; and
Twice a year consult with the Smart Growth Subcabinet established under § 9-1406 of the State Government Article on how the Department may work cooperatively to make mutual investments towards creating and supporting sustainable communities across the State.
